Title: Son frère
Writer: Philippe Besson (novel), Patrice Chéreau (scenario), Anne-Louise Trividic (scenario)
Actors: Bruno Todeschini, Éric Caravaca, Nathalie Boutefeu, Maurice Garrel
Plot: Two brothers with a problematic relationship in the past, find together again when the elder one gets a dangerous disease and asks his brother to accompany him to several doctors.
